original:
[Laceration]の無い対象なら、マッチ威力 -1, 的中時に対象の[Laceration]威力だけ体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[Laceration]の無い対象なら、マッチ威力 -1, 的中時に対象の[Laceration]威力だけ体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[Laceration]이 없는 대상이면, 합 위력 -1, 적중시 대상의 [Laceration] 위력만큼 체력 회복
EN:
If the target does not have [Laceration], Clash Power -1; On Hit, heal HP equal to [Laceration] Potency on the target

original:
[Laceration]がある対象なら、マッチ威力 +2, [Laceration]の無い対象なら、マッチ威力 -2, 的中時に対象の[Laceration]威力だけ体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[Laceration]がある対象なら、マッチ威力 +2, [Laceration]の無い対象なら、マッチ威力 -2, 的中時に対象の[Laceration]威力だけ体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[Laceration]이 있는 대상이면, 합 위력 +2, [Laceration]이 없는 대상이면, 합 위력 -2, 적중시 대상의 [Laceration] 위력만큼 체력 회복
EN:
If the target has [Laceration], Clash Power +2; if the target does not have [Laceration], Clash Power -2; On Hit, heal HP equal to [Laceration] Potency on the target

KR:
책임의 무게
EN:
Burden of Responsibility

original:
- [Enhancement]2, [Vulnerable]1を得る、速度の最大値が2増加
- 体力回復量が30%増加
- ターン終了時、ターン開始よりも[RegainedStrength]の数値が低ければ次のターンに[AttackUp]2, [DefenseDown]2を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
- [Enhancement]2, [Vulnerable]1を得る、速度の最大値が2増加
- 体力回復量が30%増加
- ターン終了時、ターン開始よりも[RegainedStrength]の数値が低ければ次のターンに[AttackUp]2, [DefenseDown]2を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
- [Enhancement] 2, [Vulnerable] 1 얻음, 속도 최댓값 2 증가
- 체력 회복량 30% 증가
- 턴 종료 시 턴 시작 시보다 [RegainedStrength]의 수치가 낮으면 다음 턴에 [AttackUp] 2, [DefenseDown] 2 얻음
EN:
- Gain 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable]; raise Max Speed value by 2
- Heal +30% more HP when healing
- Turn End: if the [RegainedStrength] is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 2 [AttackUp] and [DefenseDown] next turn

original:
- [Enhancement]2, 速度の最大値が2増加
- 体力回復量が50%増加
- ターン終了時、ターン開始よりも[RegainedStrength]の数値が低ければ次のターンに[AttackUp]3, [DefenseDown]5を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
- [Enhancement]2, 速度の最大値が2増加
- 体力回復量が50%増加
- ターン終了時、ターン開始よりも[RegainedStrength]の数値が低ければ次のターンに[AttackUp]3, [DefenseDown]5を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
- [Enhancement] 2, 속도 최댓값 2 증가
- 체력 회복량 50% 증가
- 턴 종료 시 턴 시작 시보다 [RegainedStrength]의 수치가 낮으면 다음 턴에 [AttackUp] 3, [DefenseDown] 5 얻음
EN:
- Gain 2 [Enhancement] and raise Max Speed value by 2
- Heal +50% more HP when healing
- Turn End: if the [RegainedStrength] is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 3 [AttackUp] and 5 [DefenseDown] next turn
